DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate SUN11031 injection compare placebo subject cachexia associate Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) determine effect physical performance body composition .
DOC.brief_title: SUN11031 Cachexia Associated With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.criteria: Male nonpregnant female subject ≥50 year age clinical diagnosis COPD Loss > 5 % subject 's usual body weight Severe anemia ( hemoglobin ≤8 g/dL ) COPD exacerbation Currently undergo treatment evaluation cancer Type I type II diabetes mellitus fast serum glucose ≥115 mg/dL
DOC.keyword: Cachexia , COPD , Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
